title: "Untitled"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(jsonlite)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
theme_set(theme_classic() + theme(axis.text = element_blank(),
                                  axis.title = element_blank(),
                                  axis.ticks = element_blank()
                                  ))
```


command for getting output:
```{sh}
for i in `seq 1 10`; do webppl omniglot.wppl --require underscore --require b-spline --random-seed $i | tail -1 > out$i.json; done
```

```{r}
filenames = list.files(pattern = "out")
ds = Map(function(filename,i) transform(fromJSON(filename),seed=i),
         filenames,
         1:length(filenames)
         )

d = do.call(rbind, ds)
```


set points
```{r}
qplot(data = d,
      facets = ~ seed,
      x = x,
      y = y,
      geom = c('path'),
      color = factor(strokeNum),
      size = I(1))
```
